headline.main: ALLIED FLIERS RAID FOE'S BASE AT BUKA,; Japanese Airdrome at North Tip of Solomons Blasted by 5 Tons of Bombs MILNE BAY AREA CLEARED Kokoda Attacked From Air, but Ground Fighting Halts -- Lae Also Is Target

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATIONS HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Thursday, Sept. 3 (AP) -- Allied bombers of General MacArthur's command made a heavy attack on the Japanese airdrome at Buka, at the northern tip of the Solomon Islands, in a raid last night, unloading five tons of bombs along the runway and upon enemy installations, it was announced today.
abstract: Milne Bay area cleared of Japanese
